info.title: Taxamo
info.description: Taxamoâ€™s elegant suite of APIs and comprehensive reporting dashboard enables digital merchants to easily comply with EU regulatory requirements on tax calculation, evidence collection, tax return creation and data storage.

parameters.name: format

parameters.description: ISO 2-letter country code which will be used for determining which country is domestic.

parameters.name: period_length
parameters.description: Length of report period. 'month', 'quarter' and 'year' values are accepted. Required only if Large Filer Format is requested.

parameters.name: lff_sequence_number
parameters.description: Sequence number used to generate report in Large Filer Format. If not specified then '0000000001' will be used.

parameters.name: transformation
parameters.description: Which transformation should be applied. Please note that transformation will be applied only for xml and csv formats.

parameters.description: Period start month in yyyy-MM format. Either quarter or start-month and end-month have to be provided.

parameters.description: Period end month in yyyy-MM format. Either quarter or start-month and end-month have to be provided.

parameters.description: MOSS-assigned tax ID - if not provided, merchant's national tax number will be used. Deprecated, please use tax-id.

parameters.description: ISO 3-letter currency code, e.g. EUR or USD. If provided, all amounts will be coerced for this currency. Defaults to region's currency code.

parameters.name: end_month
parameters.description: Period end month in yyyy-MM format. Either quarter or start-month and end-month have to be provided.

parameters.name: tax_id
parameters.description: MOSS-assigned tax ID - if not provided, merchant's national tax number will be used. Deprecated, please use tax-id.

parameters.name: refund_date_kind_override
parameters.description: Set to 'order_date' to show only refunds for the transactions in the selected reporting period. Set to 'refund_timestamp' to show refunds that were created in the selected reporting period. Do not set to use the default region's setting.

parameters.name: start_month
parameters.description: Period start month in yyyy-MM format. Either quarter or start-month and end-month have to be provided.

parameters.name: moss_country_code
parameters.description: MOSS country code, used to determine currency/region. If ommited, merchant default setting is used. Deprecated: please use tax-country-code.

parameters.description: Tax entity country code, used to determine currency/region.

parameters.name: buyer_credit_card_prefix
parameters.description: First 6 digits of buyer's credit card prefix.

parameters.name: currency_code
parameters.description: Currency code for transaction - e.g. EUR.

parameters.name: invoice_address_region
parameters.description: Invoice address/region

parameters.name: unit_price
parameters.description: Unit price.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: Quantity Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: buyer_tax_number
parameters.description: Buyer's tax number - EU VAT number for example. If using EU VAT number, it is possible to provide country code in it (e.g. IE1234567X) or simply use billing_country_code field for that. In the first case, if billing_country_code value was provided, it will be overwritten with country code value extracted from VAT number - but only if the VAT has been verified properly.

parameters.name: force_country_code
parameters.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. Use it to force country code for tax calculation.

parameters.name: order_date
parameters.description: Order date in yyyy-MM-dd format, in merchant's timezone. If provided by the API caller, no timezone conversion is performed. Default value is current date and time. When using public token, the default value is used.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount. Required if total amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

parameters.name: billing_country_code
parameters.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

parameters.name: invoice_address_postal_code
parameters.description: Invoice address/postal_code

parameters.name: total_amount
parameters.description: Total amount. Required if amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

parameters.name: tax_deducted
parameters.description: If the transaction is in a country supported by Taxamo, but the tax is not calculated due to merchant settings or EU B2B transaction for example.

parameters.description: If true, results are sorted in descending order.

parameters.description: Transaction invoice number.

parameters.description: Comma separated list of of transaction statuses. 'N' - unconfirmed transaction, 'C' - confirmed transaction.

parameters.name: order_date_from
parameters.description: Order date from in yyyy-MM-dd format.

parameters.name: total_amount_greater_than
parameters.description: Return only transactions with total amount greater than given number. Transactions with total amount equal to a given number (e.g. 0) are not returned.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format - supports 'csv' value for this operation.

parameters.name: total_amount_less_than
parameters.description: Return only transactions with total amount less than a given number. Transactions with total amount equal to a given number (e.g. 1) are not returned.

parameters.name: tax_country_code
parameters.description: Two letter ISO tax country code.

day.description: Date for stats in yyyy-MM-dd format.

day_raw.description: Date for stats in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

day.description: Date for stats in yyyy-MM-dd format.

day_raw.description: Date for stats in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

fx_rate.description: Foreign exchange rate used in calculation

amount.description: Amount. Required if total amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

billing_country_code.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

buyer_credit_card_prefix.description: First 6 digits of buyer's credit card prefix.

buyer_tax_number.description: Buyer's tax number - EU VAT number for example. If using EU VAT number, it is possible to provide country code in it (e.g. IE1234567X) or simply use billing_country_code field for that. In the first case, if billing_country_code value was provided, it will be overwritten with country code value extracted from VAT number - but only if the VAT has been verified properly.

currency_code.description: Currency code for transaction - e.g. EUR.

force_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. Use it to force country code for tax calculation.

order_date.description: Order date in yyyy-MM-dd format, in merchant's timezone. If provided by the API caller, no timezone conversion is performed. Default value is current date and time. When using public token, the default value is used.

tax_deducted.description: If the transaction is in a country supported by Taxamo, but the tax is not calculated due to merchant settings or EU B2B transaction for example.

total_amount.description: Total amount. Required if amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

storage_required_fields.description: Fields required for transaction storage (can be added later - it's up to merchant software). Depends on the region/transaction type.

tax_required_fields.description: Fields required for tax calculation. Depends on the region/transaction type.

billing_country_code.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

buyer_credit_card_prefix.description: First 6 digits of buyer's credit card prefix.

buyer_ip.description: IP address of the buyer in dotted decimal (IPv4) or text format (IPv6).

tax_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. This code applies to detected/set country for transaction, but can be set using manual mode.

tax_deducted.description: If the transaction is in a country supported by Taxamo, but the tax is not calculated due to merchant settings or EU B2B transaction for example.

tax_supported.description: Is tax calculation supported for a detected tax location?

storage_required_fields.description: Fields required for transaction storage (can be added later - it's up to merchant software). Depends on the region/transaction type.

tax_required_fields.description: Fields required for tax calculation. Depends on the region/transaction type.

storage_required_fields.description: Fields required for transaction storage (can be added later - it's up to merchant software). Depends on the region/transaction type.

tax_required_fields.description: Fields required for tax calculation. Depends on the region/transaction type.

callingCode.description: List of phone number calling codes.

tax_number_country_code.description: VAT number country code. Important for Greece.

tax_region.description: Tax region code - e.g. EU, US, NO, JP...

tax_supported.description: True if tax calculation supported for this country.

callingCode.description: List of phone number calling codes.

tax_number_country_code.description: VAT number country code. Important for Greece.

tax_region.description: Tax region code - e.g. EU, US, NO, JP...

tax_supported.description: True if tax calculation supported for this country.

amount.description: Amount that has been paid. Use negative value to register refunds.

payment_timestamp.description: When the payment was received in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss(.SSS)'Z' format (24 hour, UTC timezone). Defaults to current date and time.

amount.description: Amount (without tax) to be refunded. Either amount or total amount is required. In case of line key and custom id missing, only total_amount can be used.

custom_id.description: Line custom identifier. If neither line key or custom id is provided, the refund amount will be assigned to lines in order.

line_key.description: Line identifier. If neither line key or custom id is provided, the refund amount will be assigned to lines in order.

refund_reason.description: Refund reason, displayed on the credit note.

total_amount.description: Total amount, including tax, to be refunded. Either amount or total amount is required. In case of line key and custom id missing, only total_amount can be used.

refunded_tax_amount.description: Total tax amount, that was refunded for this line.

refunded_total_amount.description: Total amount, including tax, that was refunded for this line.

tax_amount.description: Calculated tax amount, that was refunded in this call.

total_amount.description: Total amount, including tax, that was refunded in this call.

success.description: Always set to true. Success means that the message has been queued for delivery. In some cases message may be undelivered at the end, e.g. mobile number is blacklisted. API errors are signalled with appropriate error codes.

manual_mode.description: Use manual mode, bypassing country detection. Only allowed with private token. This flag allows to use original_transaction_key field

storage_required_fields.description: Fields required for transaction storage (can be added later - it's up to merchant software). Depends on the region/transaction type.

tax_required_fields.description: Fields required for tax calculation. Depends on the region/transaction type.

minorunits.description: Number of minor units for currency.

buyer_email.description: Email to send the invoice. If not provided, transaction.buyer_email will be used.
Email to send the credit note/refund note. If not provided, transaction.buyer_email will be used.

evidence_value.description: Value provided as evidence - for example IP address.

resolved_country_code.description: Country code that was resolved using this evidence.

used.description: If the evidence was used to match the actual country.

tax_supported.description: Should only countries with tax supported be listed?

country_codes.description: Comma separated list of 2-letter country codes

date_from.description: Take only refunds issued at or after the date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd

date_to.description: Take only refunds issued at or before the date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd

format.description: Output format. 'json' or 'csv'. Default value is 'json'

country_code.description: ISO 2-letter country code which will be used for determining which country is domestic.

currency_code.description: ISO 3-letter currency code, e.g. EUR or USD. Defaults to the one assigned to MOSS calculations for a given country code.

end_month.description: Period end month in yyyy-MM format.

format.description: Output format. 'xml' and 'csv' values are accepted. Default format - json

fx_date_type.description: Which date should be used for FX.

start_month.description: Period start month in yyyy-MM format.

end_date.description: Period end date in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

global_refunds_amount.description: Global sales refunds amount. This includes refunds from domestic country too.

global_refunds_tax_amount.description: Global sales refunds amount. This includes refunds from domestic country too.

global_sales_amount.description: Global sales amount. This includes sales from domestic country too.

global_sales_tax_amount.description: Global sales amount. This includes sales from domestic country too.

start_date.description: Period start date in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

currency_code.description: ISO 3-letter currency code, e.g. EUR or USD. Defaults to the one assigned to MOSS calculations for a given country code.

end_month.description: Period end month in yyyy-MM format.

eu_country_code.description: ISO 2-letter country code which will be used for determining which country is domestic.

format.description: Output format. 'xml', 'csv' and 'lff' (only for Ireland) values are accepted as well

fx_date_type.description: Which date should be used for FX.

lff_sequence_number.description: Sequence number used to generate report in Large Filer Format. If not specified then '0000000001' will be used.

period_length.description: Length of report period. 'month', 'quarter' and 'year' values are accepted. Required only if Large Filer Format is requested.

start_month.description: Period start month in yyyy-MM format.

tax_id.description: MOSS-assigned tax ID - if not provided, merchant's national tax number will be used.

transformation.description: Which transformation should be applied. Please note that transformation will be applied only for xml and csv formats.

end_date.description: Period end date in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

start_date.description: Period start date in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

date_from.description: Take only refunds issued at or after the date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd

format.description: Output format. 'csv' value is accepted as well

moss_country_code.description: MOSS country code, used to determine currency. If ommited, merchant default setting is used.

tax_region.description: Tax region key, defaults to EU for backwards compatibility.

currency_code.description: ISO 3-letter currency code, e.g. EUR or USD. If provided, all amounts will be coerced for this currency. Defaults to region's currency code.

end_month.description: Period end month in yyyy-MM format. Either quarter or start-month and end-month have to be provided.

format.description: Output format. 'csv' value is accepted as well

moss_country_code.description: MOSS country code, used to determine currency/region. If ommited, merchant default setting is used. Deprecated: please use tax-country-code.

moss_tax_id.description: MOSS-assigned tax ID - if not provided, merchant's national tax number will be used. Deprecated, please use tax-id.

refund_date_kind_override.description: Set to 'order_date' to show only refunds for the transactions in the selected reporting period. Set to 'refund_timestamp' to show refunds that were created in the selected reporting period. Do not set to use the default region's setting.

start_month.description: Period start month in yyyy-MM format. Either quarter or start-month and end-month have to be provided.

tax_country_code.description: Tax entity country code, used to determine currency/region.

tax_id.description: MOSS-assigned tax ID - if not provided, merchant's national tax number will be used. Deprecated, please use tax-id.

end_date.description: Period end date in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

fx_rate_date.description: Date of ECB FX rate used for conversions in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format. Applies to tax regions where

indicative.description: If the quarter isn't closed yet, tax amount is indicative, as we cannot determine FX rate or all transactions yet.

start_date.description: Period start date in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

end_month.description: Period end month in yyyy-MM format. Either quarter or start-month and end-month have to be provided.

moss_country_code.description: MOSS country code, used to determine currency. If ommited, merchant default setting is used.

start_month.description: Period start month in yyyy-MM format. Either quarter or start-month and end-month have to be provided.

storage_required_fields.description: Fields required for transaction storage (can be added later - it's up to merchant software). Depends on the region/transaction type.

tax_required_fields.description: Fields required for tax calculation. Depends on the region/transaction type.

global_currency_code.description: Global currency code to use for conversion - in addition to country's currency if rate is available. Conversion is indicative and based on most-recent rate from ECB.

billing_country_code.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

buyer_credit_card_prefix.description: First 6 digits of buyer's credit card prefix.

buyer_ip.description: IP address of the buyer in dotted decimal (IPv4) or text format (IPv6).

buyer_name.description: Buyer's name - first name and last name or company name.

buyer_tax_number.description: Buyer's tax number - EU VAT number for example. If using EU VAT number, it is possible to provide country code in it (e.g. IE1234567X) or simply use billing_country_code field for that. In the first case, if billing_country_code value was provided, it will be overwritten with country code value extracted from VAT number - but only if the VAT has been verified properly.

comments.description: Additional information about the transaction - for example if the evidence has been amended.

currency_code.description: Currency code for transaction - e.g. EUR.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields, stored as key-value pairs. This property is not processed and used mostly with Taxamo-built helpers.

custom_id.description: Custom identifier provided upon transaction creation.

customer_id.description: Free-form field for storing customer id.

force_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. Use it to force country code for tax calculation.

note.description: Additional note related to transaction state - for example if the transaction was created in a 'catch-all' mode or the VAT number re-check for subscriptions has failed.

order_date.description: Order date in yyyy-MM-dd format, in merchant's timezone. If provided by the API caller, no timezone conversion is performed. Default value is current date and time. When using public token, the default value is used.

original_transaction_key.description: Use data and evidence from original transaction. Tax will be re-calculated, but evidence won't be re-checked. This parameter is taken into account only when 'manual' flag is raised.

status.description: Transaction status: 'N' - new, 'C' - confirmed. Can use 'C' in store-transaction! with private-token to create confirmed transaction, otherwise 'N' is default status. Not applicable for update-transaction!.

tax_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. This code applies to detected/set country for transaction, but can be set using manual mode.

tax_deducted.description: True if the transaction is deducted from tax and no tax is applied (it is untaxed). Either set automatically when VAT number validates with VIES correctly, but can also be provided in manual mode.

amount.description: Amount. Required if total amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields, stored as key-value pairs. This property is not processed and used mostly with Taxamo-built helpers.

custom_id.description: Custom id, provided by ecommerce software.

deducted_tax_rate.description: Deducted tax rate, calculated by taxamo.

informative.description: If the line is provided for informative purposes. Such line must have :tax-rate and optionally :tax-name - if not, API validation will fail for this line.

product_code.description: Internal product code, used for invoicing for example.

product_tax_code.description: External product tax code for a line, for example TIC in US Sales tax.

supply_date.description: Date of supply in yyyy-MM-dd format.

tax_name.description: Tax name, calculated by taxamo.  Can be overwritten when informative field is true.

tax_rate.description: Tax rate, calculated by taxamo. Must be provided when informative field is true.

total_amount.description: Total amount. Required if amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

billing_country_code.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

buyer_credit_card_prefix.description: First 6 digits of buyer's credit card prefix.

buyer_ip.description: IP address of the buyer in dotted decimal (IPv4) or text format (IPv6).

buyer_name.description: Buyer's name - first name and last name or company name.

buyer_tax_number.description: Buyer's tax number - EU VAT number for example. If using EU VAT number, it is possible to provide country code in it (e.g. IE1234567X) or simply use billing_country_code field for that. In the first case, if billing_country_code value was provided, it will be overwritten with country code value extracted from VAT number - but only if the VAT has been verified properly.

comments.description: Additional information about the transaction - for example if the evidence has been amended.

currency_code.description: Currency code for transaction - e.g. EUR.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields, stored as key-value pairs. This property is not processed and used mostly with Taxamo-built helpers.

custom_id.description: Custom identifier provided upon transaction creation.

customer_id.description: Free-form field for storing customer id.

force_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. Use it to force country code for tax calculation.

note.description: Additional note related to transaction state - for example if the transaction was created in a 'catch-all' mode or the VAT number re-check for subscriptions has failed.

order_date.description: Order date in yyyy-MM-dd format, in merchant's timezone. If provided by the API caller, no timezone conversion is performed. Default value is current date and time. When using public token, the default value is used.

original_transaction_key.description: Use data and evidence from original transaction. Tax will be re-calculated, but evidence won't be re-checked. This parameter is taken into account only when 'manual' flag is raised.

status.description: Transaction status: 'N' - new, 'C' - confirmed. Can use 'C' in store-transaction! with private-token to create confirmed transaction, otherwise 'N' is default status. Not applicable for update-transaction!.

tax_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. This code applies to detected/set country for transaction, but can be set using manual mode.

tax_deducted.description: True if the transaction is deducted from tax and no tax is applied (it is untaxed). Either set automatically when VAT number validates with VIES correctly, but can also be provided in manual mode.

address_detail.description: Address details - for example apartament number.

freeform_address.description: Freeform address. Use when structured data is not available. Will be used in SAF-MOSS file if other fields are not provided.

region.description: Region, for United States - state code - e.g. NJ.

limit.description: Max record count (no more than 100, defaults to 10).

offset.description: How many records need to be skipped, defaults to 0.

format.description: Output format - supports 'csv' value for this operation.

has_note.description: Return only transactions with a note field set.

key_or_custom_id.description: Taxamo provided transaction key or custom id

order_date_from.description: Order date from in yyyy-MM-dd format.

order_date_to.description: Order date to in yyyy-MM-dd format.

sort_reverse.description: If true, results are sorted in descending order.

statuses.description: Comma separated list of of transaction statuses. 'N' - unconfirmed transaction, 'C' - confirmed transaction.

tax_country_code.description: Two letter ISO tax country code.

tax_country_codes.description: Comma separated list of two letter ISO tax country codes.

total_amount_greater_than.description: Return only transactions with total amount greater than given number. Transactions with total amount equal to a given number (e.g. 0) are not returned.

total_amount_less_than.description: Return only transactions with total amount less than a given number. Transactions with total amount equal to a given number (e.g. 1) are not returned.

amount.description: Amount that has been paid. Use negative value to register refunds.

payment_timestamp.description: When the payment was received in yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss (24 hour format, UTC+0 timezone).

amount.description: Amount, excluding tax, that was refunded.

informative.description: Was this refund applied to an informative line?

line_key.description: Line identifier. If neither line key or custom id is provided, the refund amount will be assigned to lines in order.

refund_reason.description: Refund reason, displayed on the credit note.

tax_amount.description: Calculated tax amount, that was refunded.

tax_rate.description: Tax rate for the line that was used for the refund calculation.

total_amount.description: Total amount, including tax, that was refunded.

country_subdivision.description: Country subdivision (e.g. state or provice or county)

skip_moss.description: If true, this line should not be entered into MOSS and is provided for informative purposes only. For example because the country is the same as MOSS registration country and merchant country.

day.description: Date for stats in yyyy-MM-dd format.

day_raw.description: Date for stats in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

currency_code.description: In which currency code the settlement was calculated.

end_date.description: Period end date in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

fx_rate_date.description: Date of ECB FX rate used for conversions in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

indicative.description: If the quarter isn't closed yet, tax amount is indicative, as we cannot determine FX rate or all transactions yet.

quarter.description: Quarter that this summary applies to.

start_date.description: Period start date in yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' format.

tax_amount.description: Tax amount due in this quarter.

tax_entity_name.description: Tax entity that the tax is due.

billing_country_code.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

buyer_credit_card_prefix.description: First 6 digits of buyer's credit card prefix.

buyer_ip.description: IP address of the buyer in dotted decimal (IPv4) or text format (IPv6).

buyer_name.description: Buyer's name - first name and last name or company name.

buyer_tax_number.description: Buyer's tax number - EU VAT number for example. If using EU VAT number, it is possible to provide country code in it (e.g. IE1234567X) or simply use billing_country_code field for that. In the first case, if billing_country_code value was provided, it will be overwritten with country code value extracted from VAT number - but only if the VAT has been verified properly.

buyer_tax_number_valid.description: If the buyer tax number has been provided and was validated successfully. Always true for domestic transactions (billing country same as merchant's country), tax number doesn't get validated in that case.

comments.description: Additional information about the transaction - for example if the evidence has been amended.

confirm_timestamp.description: Date and time of transaction confirmation.

create_timestamp.description: Date and time of transaction creation.

currency_code.description: Currency code for transaction - e.g. EUR.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields, stored as key-value pairs. This property is not processed and used mostly with Taxamo-built helpers.

custom_id.description: Custom identifier provided upon transaction creation.

customer_id.description: Free-form field for storing customer id.

deducted_tax_amount.description: How much tax has been deducted.

force_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. Use it to force country code for tax calculation.

fully_informative.description: Set to true if transaction has only informative lines.

invoice_image_url.description: Invoice image URL - provided by Taxamo.

kind.description: Transaction kind: eu-b2c, eu-b2b, domestic, untaxed

manual.description: Is the transaction created manually - using private token. In manual mode, it is the merchant who calculates tax country and validates evidence. If you need API to do that when accessing the API with private token, just skip the 'manual' flag or use false value there and provide customer's ip address through buyer_ip field. Manual mode is also used when using original_transaction_key field.

note.description: Additional note related to transaction state - for example if the transaction was created in a 'catch-all' mode or the VAT number re-check for subscriptions has failed.

order_date.description: Order date in yyyy-MM-dd format, in merchant's timezone. If provided by the API caller, no timezone conversion is performed. Default value is current date and time. When using public token, the default value is used.

original_transaction_key.description: Use data and evidence from original transaction. Tax will be re-calculated, but evidence won't be re-checked. This parameter is taken into account only when 'manual' flag is raised.

status.description: Transaction status: 'N' - new, 'C' - confirmed. Can use 'C' in store-transaction! with private-token to create confirmed transaction, otherwise 'N' is default status. Not applicable for update-transaction!.

tax_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. This code applies to detected/set country for transaction, but can be set using manual mode.

tax_deducted.description: If the transaction is in a country supported by Taxamo, but the tax is not calculated due to merchant settings or EU B2B transaction for example.

tax_entity_name.description: To which entity is the tax due.

tax_number_service.description: Tax number service identifier - if available for a given region and the region is enabled.

tax_supported.description: Is tax calculation supported for a detected tax location?

test.description: Was this transaction created in test mode?

amount.description: Amount. Required if total amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields, stored as key-value pairs. This property is not processed and used mostly with Taxamo-built helpers.

custom_id.description: Custom id, provided by ecommerce software.

deducted_tax_amount.description: Deducted tax amount, calculated by taxmo.

deducted_tax_rate.description: Deducted tax rate, calculated by taxamo.

informative.description: If the line is provided for informative purposes. Such line must have :tax-rate and optionally :tax-name - if not, API validation will fail for this line.

product_code.description: Internal product code, used for invoicing for example.

product_tax_code.description: External product tax code for a line, for example TIC in US Sales tax.

refunded_tax_amount.description: Refunded tax amount, calculated by taxmo.

refunded_total_amount.description: Refunded total amount, calculated by taxmo.

supply_date.description: Date of supply in yyyy-MM-dd format.

tax_name.description: Tax name, calculated by taxamo.  Can be overwritten when informative field is true.

tax_rate.description: Tax rate, calculated by taxamo. Must be provided when informative field is true.

total_amount.description: Total amount. Required if amount or both unit price and quantity are not provided.

billing_country_code.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

buyer_credit_card_prefix.description: First 6 digits of buyer's credit card prefix.

buyer_ip.description: IP address of the buyer in dotted decimal (IPv4) or text format (IPv6).

buyer_name.description: Buyer's name - first name and last name or company name.

buyer_tax_number.description: Buyer's tax number - EU VAT number for example. If using EU VAT number, it is possible to provide country code in it (e.g. IE1234567X) or simply use billing_country_code field for that. In the first case, if billing_country_code value was provided, it will be overwritten with country code value extracted from VAT number - but only if the VAT has been verified properly.

buyer_tax_number_valid.description: If the buyer tax number has been provided and was validated successfully. Always true for domestic transactions (billing country same as merchant's country), tax number doesn't get validated in that case.

comments.description: Additional information about the transaction - for example if the evidence has been amended.

confirm_timestamp.description: Date and time of transaction confirmation.

create_timestamp.description: Date and time of transaction creation.

currency_code.description: Currency code for transaction - e.g. EUR.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields, stored as key-value pairs. This property is not processed and used mostly with Taxamo-built helpers.

custom_id.description: Custom identifier provided upon transaction creation.

customer_id.description: Free-form field for storing customer id.

deducted_tax_amount.description: How much tax has been deducted.

force_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. Use it to force country code for tax calculation.

fully_informative.description: Set to true if transaction has only informative lines.

invoice_image_url.description: Invoice image URL - provided by Taxamo.

kind.description: Transaction kind: eu-b2c, eu-b2b, domestic, untaxed

manual.description: Is the transaction created manually - using private token. In manual mode, it is the merchant who calculates tax country and validates evidence. If you need API to do that when accessing the API with private token, just skip the 'manual' flag or use false value there and provide customer's ip address through buyer_ip field. Manual mode is also used when using original_transaction_key field.

note.description: Additional note related to transaction state - for example if the transaction was created in a 'catch-all' mode or the VAT number re-check for subscriptions has failed.

order_date.description: Order date in yyyy-MM-dd format, in merchant's timezone. If provided by the API caller, no timezone conversion is performed. Default value is current date and time. When using public token, the default value is used.

original_transaction_key.description: Use data and evidence from original transaction. Tax will be re-calculated, but evidence won't be re-checked. This parameter is taken into account only when 'manual' flag is raised.

status.description: Transaction status: 'N' - new, 'C' - confirmed. Can use 'C' in store-transaction! with private-token to create confirmed transaction, otherwise 'N' is default status. Not applicable for update-transaction!.

tax_country_code.description: Two-letter ISO country code, e.g. FR. This code applies to detected/set country for transaction, but can be set using manual mode.

tax_deducted.description: If the transaction is in a country supported by Taxamo, but the tax is not calculated due to merchant settings or EU B2B transaction for example.

tax_entity_name.description: To which entity is the tax due.

tax_number_service.description: Tax number service identifier - if available for a given region and the region is enabled.

tax_supported.description: Is tax calculation supported for a detected tax location?

test.description: Was this transaction created in test mode?

storage_required_fields.description: Fields required for transaction storage (can be added later - it's up to merchant software). Depends on the region/transaction type.

tax_required_fields.description: Fields required for tax calculation. Depends on the region/transaction type.

storage_required_fields.description: Fields required for transaction storage (can be added later - it's up to merchant software). Depends on the region/transaction type.

tax_required_fields.description: Fields required for tax calculation. Depends on the region/transaction type.

exempt_states.description: List of states where the certificate is valid.

purchaser_business_type_other_value.description: If business type is other, a short description must be provided.

single_purchase.description: Set to true if this certificate is valid for single purchase only.

billing_country_code.description: Billing two letter ISO country code.

buyer_tax_number.description: Buyer's tax number - EU VAT number for example. If using EU VAT number, it is possible to provide country code in it (e.g. IE1234567X) or simply use billing_country_code field for that. In the first case, if billing_country_code value was provided, it will be overwritten with country code value extracted from VAT number - but only if the VAT has been verified properly.

buyer_tax_number_valid.description: If the buyer tax number has been provided and was validated successfully. Always true for domestic transactions (billing country same as merchant's country), tax number doesn't get validated in that case.

tax_deducted.description: If the transaction is in a country supported by Taxamo, but the tax is not calculated due to merchant settings or EU B2B transaction for example.

country_code.description: Verified country code, returned if operation was successful.
